statements: SELECT * FROM geofence_reports;
SELECT location_name, geofence_radius FROM geofence_reports WHERE target_population > 100;
SELECT report_id, location_name, geofence_radius FROM geofence_reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_reports WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, geofence_radius, campaign_start_date FROM geofence_reports WHERE campaign_end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM geofence_reports WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT location_name, geofence_radius FROM geofence_reports WHERE target_population > 100 ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_reports WHERE campaign_start_date < '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_id, location_name, target_population FROM geofence_reports WHERE geofence_radius BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY campaign_start_date ASC, campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM geofence_reports WHERE target_population > 50 AND geofence_radius < 75 ORDER BY location_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM geofence_report;
SELECT id, name, location FROM geofence_report WHERE location='City A';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, budget FROM marketing_efforts WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT id, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_efforts WHERE end_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM geofence_report WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-08-31';
SELECT * FROM geofence_report WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, location FROM geofence_report WHERE location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT id, name, start_date, end_date FROM geofence_report ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_efforts WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_efforts WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM geofence_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, location_id FROM geofence_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_locations WHERE radius > 10;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Female';
SELECT report_id, report_date, marketing_campaign FROM geofence_reports WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM geofence_reports;
SELECT report_id, report_date, marketing_campaign FROM geofence_reports WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geofence_locations ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT campaign_name, budget, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' AND target_audience = 'Women';
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT id, name, radius FROM geofences WHERE radius > 100;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM geofences ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, date, total_visits FROM reports WHERE total_visits > 50 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT cr.id, c.name AS campaign_name, r.date AS report_date FROM campaigns c INNER JOIN campaign_reports cr ON c.id = cr.campaign_id INNER JOIN reports r ON r.id = cr.report_id;
SELECT * FROM geofences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM geofences WHERE radius > 100;
SELECT date, total_visits FROM reports WHERE geofence_id = 3 ORDER BY date DESC;

SELECT campaigns.name, campaign_reports.report_id, reports.total_visits FROM campaigns JOIN campaign_reports ON campaigns.id = campaign_reports.campaign_id JOIN reports ON reports.id = campaign_reports.report_id WHERE campaigns.start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_campaigns, MIN(campaigns.start_date) AS earliest_start_date FROM campaigns;
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT name, start_date, end_date FROM geofences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM campaign_history ORDER BY report_date DESC, impressions ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM geofences;
SELECT name, location_geometry FROM geofences WHERE id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_id, SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM campaign_history GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT users.name, users.email, marketing_metrics.impressions FROM users INNER JOIN marketing_metrics ON users.id = marketing_metrics.campaign_id WHERE marketing_metrics.report_date = '2022-01-01';
